values: Lord, Teach Us to Fight: The Double Battle in GethsemaneLord, Teach Us to Fight: The Double Battle in Gethsemane

Jesus took the cup of God’s wrath so that we would never have to. And now he beckons each of us to join him in speaking and sharing the good news of his victory.Jesus took the cup of God’s wrath so that we would never have to. And now he beckons each of us to join him in speaking and sharing the good news of his victory.
